Package org.skistation.controllers

Class PriceListController

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.controllers.PriceListController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/priceLists") public class PriceListController extends Object
Controller for managing price lists. It is responsible for handling requests related to price lists.

    • getPriceListById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public PriceList getPriceListById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Gets a price list by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the price list.
      Returns:
      the price list with the specified ID.

    • getAllPriceLists

      @GetMapping("") public List<PriceList> getAllPriceLists()
      Gets all price lists.
      Returns:
      a list of all price lists.

    • getActualPriceLists

      @GetMapping("/actual") public List<PriceList> getActualPriceLists()
      Gets actual price lists.
      Returns:
      a list of actual price lists.

    • addPriceList

      @PostMapping("/addPriceList") public String addPriceList(@RequestBody PriceList priceList)
      Adds a new price list.
      Parameters:
      priceList - the price list to add.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the price lists page.

    • deletePriceList

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public String deletePriceList(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Deletes a price list.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the price list to delete.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the price lists page.
